title: PROENZA SCHOULER logo
content:
Does anyone have a match for this? Looks a bit like Sackers, but the A bar is off.

 [‹ (x) Enumclaw Community Hospital - ITC Panache {Mark S}](http://web.archive.org/web/20070806231106/http:/typophile.com/node/19358 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Hand-drawn book type - FreeDom {Mike Y (self)} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070806231106/http:/typophile.com/node/19306 "Go to next forum topic")
author: kristin

comments.content:
Try the link. My attaching abilities are failing today!

HUGE VERSION:

[http://cdn-56.cdn.buzznet.com/assets/users10/ravenmn/default/msg-1145484...](http://web.archive.org/web/20070806231106/http:/cdn-56.cdn.buzznet.com/assets/users10/ravenmn/default/msg-114548406077-2.jpg "http://cdn-56.cdn.buzznet.com/assets/users10/ravenmn/default/msg-114548406077-2.jpg")

SMALL VERSION FOLLOWS:

[http://cdn-48.cdn.buzznet.com/assets/users10/ravenmn/default/msg-1145485...](http://web.archive.org/web/20070806231106/http:/cdn-48.cdn.buzznet.com/assets/users10/ravenmn/default/msg-114548525464-2.jpg "http://cdn-48.cdn.buzznet.com/assets/users10/ravenmn/default/msg-114548525464-2.jpg")

Kristin, I’m having problems with your sample, and I just found out why: it’s saved in CMYK and it’s a whopping 1393 pixels wide! Next time please make sure you post an RGB image and do not exceed 620 pixels.
It’s not Bitstream’s Engravers Gothic neither.

Wouldn’t the Sqooshi-ness(tm) show more in the O and S?

I did suggest that to our art director and I’m told he rejected it. Maybe I’ll push it at him again. I can try calling the designer herself tomorrow to see if she knows....

Thanks, Yves!
Very sad that a fashion house of such high caliber has a logo with squooshed type. Makes me cry.
